divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the bottom of my street and I was going home at the time.I noticed itwene I saw a giant thing in the air.I thought the object was a alion ship.Myreactions to the event was just amazed and my reactions were stiffness then ranhome to show every onelse.It was like a blimp but a 100 or 700 times bigger thana blimp.It had yellow lines on top an bottom and a yellow dot on the front,ayellow dot on the back,a yellow dot bellow the top line,and a yellow dot abovethe yellow line on the bottom.It also had like blue wrighting in a red coloredrectangel which was in between the yelow dots and lines I also dont think it wasby any humans.Its actions were just setting there then when I got home to showeveryonelse it disappered with no sound,no dust it just disappered with out atrace.
